attributes.action: remove from this web-site all petitions that deny or  decry the concept of man-made climate change until such time that the petitioners have demonstrated that  they have read and understood the majority scientific opinion.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
75% of qualified scientists support the concept of manmade climate change (mmcc).

Many of those that oppose it can be shown to have connections to the oil industry and other carbon emitting industries.

However it is clear that several petitioners have failed to read, let alone understand, the information available; relying instead on media presentations which have used false or distorted information to support politcal opinions of their producers.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
